comment: Avoid her at all cost.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Lecture heavy

comment: Dr. Samuel does spend too much time trying to motivate students. If you go to class, you will understand the concepts much better. She really makes sure her students understand the material. You need to study and practice outside of class. You can't be lazy in this class and be successful. Provides plenty of extra credit. Definitely recommend.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Test heavy--Lecture heavy

comment: This class won't be the right choice for you if you're not okay with teaching yourself all of the material. She's a sweet lady who seems like she genuinely cares about her students, but she's not the best professor. Go to SI, do the practice questions in the book, and form a study group!! Without my girls I wouldn't have done as well.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy

comment: She says she cares about you doing well in the course but than gets mad and makes you feel dumb when u ask multiple questions. She offers 1 extra credit opurtunity that helps out but overall I do not recommend. She doesnt let us start tests until 10 minutes after class starts. You need to teach yourself the material to do well.

She takes pride in making you work for your grade. I believe the biggest reason people don't do well in this class is because it's so much information to take in, 3-4 weeks before each test. Definitely study material before starting this class. She doesn't curve AT ALL and gives very minor extra credit. About 80% of the class has dropped out.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Tough grader

comment: Dr. Samuel takes pride in being a hard professor *but* she is truly one of the nicest professors at KSU. Teach yourself the entire 16 weeks & textbook will be your BFF. Only grades with tests that have a few extra credit questions (she thinks thats extremely generous so you just gotta go with it). I got an A but it wasn't without a lot of tears.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--TEST HEAVY--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Professor Samuel is the BEST organic chemistry professor!! She is down to earth and always available for help. As long as you go to class and sit through her lecture you are already on top of the game. Make sure to read the book because it will certainly be your new BEST FRIEND. She usually stays after class to help too!
rating_tags: TEST HEAVY--Caring--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Engaging in the subject material in this class really pays off and she makes sure that everybody has a chance to ask questions and participate during her lectures. She often spends time attempting to inspire students during class time, which is respectable albeit beginning to become redundant and waste valuable time. I still strongly recommend her.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Inspirational--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Although this course is typically regarded as challenging, I feel I benefited from this class especially because of this professor. Sometimes she does use up class time pushing people to give a response, but it is with good intention. She will be more than happy to address any concerns. My tip for the class would be to USE THE BOOK.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Dr. Samuel has been the BEST professor I've had (from all the sciences for nursing). She explained things so well and even gave extra credit on exams. She really liked our class so she let our grade on the final replace our lowest test grade. You HAVE to read the book to understand completely. Exams  straightforward. An A is very posssible!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: PLS DON'T DO IT. She doesn't teach or prioritize time to focus on what will show up on the test. Some of the hardest concepts she told us to go learn at home. This is already a hard subject, you need a professor who is willing to help you. Not worth the stress and frustration. The final is random stuff you weren't tested on before. DONT DO IT.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--TEST HEAVY

comment: She's not the worst but most certainly not the best. This professor's intentions are good but she doesn't seem to understand her role as a professor. She expects her students to, basically, teach themselves. Her lectures are long, boring, and pretty confusing. You can do well on exams with lot's of at-home practice.. and I mean LOTS.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She isn't horrible but def. not great.  Powerpoints are VERY confusing and material doesn't flow.  She is VERY hard to get into contact with and if you have another class then don't try to look at previous tests.  Material is hard enough as it is, but she makes it much harder.  Make sure you have the book because you won't learn it from her.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Terrible Teacher!! AVOID! She doesn't explain the information well, plus if you ask her a question she will tell you that she doesn't have time to answer. She randomly calls on students during class and embarrasses them if they don't know the answer to what she asked. Hard class to begin with and she doesn't help. Have to teach yourself everything.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: She is a very good professor and I would highly recommend taking her. If you do all of the practice problems in the book you will have no issue in her class!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: Dr. Samuel is a good teacher. I hesitated taking her course because of the reviews on here but I am glad I took the chance and had her as my professor. O Chem is hard but she gives you what you need to succeed. You are the one that has to put in the effort and she will help you along the way. Also, out of the other O Chem teachers, she's the best!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: TAKE JOMY! HER TESTS ARE SO MUCH EASIER THAN THE OTHER 1152 PROFESSORS! I've taken Meades before and failed his class because his tests were so hard. Monroe's tests are just like Meades'. She reads textbooks for fun, so obviously she tests from ours. Do all the questions in all the chapters for practice-I've done that & made an A on all 3 tests.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Caring--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Dr. Samuel is a good teacher. She goes through the material pretty fast, and she doesn't provide a lot of chances to practice the work in class, but she warned us that we needed to read the book and practice on our own. I did both and have made 100s on both of the tests we have taken. Nurses, college is hard work. Might as well get used to it.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--TEST HEAVY--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: She is the worst teacher I have ever had. She is so rude. When you do ask her questions she is so sarcastic about answering stuff. She does not curve anything, and does not give extra credit. BEWARE take anybody else except her!!!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--TEST HEAVY--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: She's honestly probably the worst professor I've taken at the university. She grades incredibly hard, doesn't curve, and if you ask a question in class, she embarrasses you in front of everyone and makes you feel dumb. You're better off teaching yourself from the textbook.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Samuels is the WORST professor I have ever taken. She refuses to do sample problems and talks to you like you are dumb. She's extremely condescending and you basically have to teach yourself. Her power points are hard to follow and she gives NO extra credit and you do not get the whole class to take the exams. DO NOT TAKE HER!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--TEST HEAVY--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Super challenging class. Buy the textbook and do the practice problems in it. No required homework. Come to every class and take notes. Do not be afraid to ask for clarification. She is willing to meet outside of class to explain concepts and tests. There are four tests and a cumulative final. Does NOT drop lowest test grade or do make up tests.
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Dr. Samuel is the hardest teacher I have had. Her test are ridiculously hard and she does not curve her test at all. give extra questions on the test for bonus points as well as she doesnt give you enough time to take the test. She teachers from powerpoint but goes way to fast to take notes, and does not explain any concepts well. good luck
rating_tags: Tough Grader--TEST HEAVY--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Beware of Dr. Samuel. The lectures she presents are awful, she does have a thick accent which made it difficult to learn from her. Tests are difficult, and requires you to basically teach yourself. She does make you feel as if you are dumb, I would never suggest her to anyone
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: She teaches all of the information very thoroughly. Big curve on most tests, and willing to help your grade if you are willing to work. Getting an A is not very hard if you show up and take notes. I would definitely take her again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--TEST HEAVY--Amazing lectures

comment: I would highly recommend to not take her if you are planning on applying to the Nursing Program.  She does not want the students to succeed, but to make you feel dumb.  I am an honors student and I have been making C's on the tests.  BEWARE of her and dont take her.  She doesn't teach the topics  or help at all.  Difficult to understand her.
rating_tags: TEST HEAVY
